DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate anti-HIV activity , safety , tolerance adefovir dipivoxil ( bis-POM PMEA ) combination standard antiretroviral therapy 48 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Center , Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Study Efficacy Safety Adefovir Dipivoxil When Added Standard Antiretroviral Therapy Treatment HIV-Infected Patients With CD4 Cell Counts > = 200/mm3
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive either adefovir dipivoxil placebo daily 24 week , patient receive open-label drug additional 24 week . Study drug administer combination current antiretroviral regimen entire 48 week . Patients follow every 4 week first 24 week study , every 8 week last 24 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection HIV RNA titer > = 2500 copies/ml ( 2.5 KEq/ml ) plasma . CD4 count > = 200 cells/mm3 . No new AIDSdefining event within past 2 month . Life expectancy least 1 year . Consent parent guardian le 18 year old . Tolerated antiretroviral therapy past 2 month . NOTE : Kaposi 's sarcoma permit provided patient receive systemic therapy within past month . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Active , serious infection HIV require parenteral antibiotic antiviral therapy . Gastrointestinal malabsorption syndrome chronic nausea vomit would preclude oral medication . Malignancy Kaposi 's sarcoma basal cell carcinoma . Systemic chemotherapeutic agent . Prior Medication : Excluded : Parenteral antibiotic antiviral therapy another active , serious infection within past 2 week .
